title: The Wheels on the Bus
short_plot_summary: The Wheels on the Bus is a fun and catchy children's song that describes the sounds made by various parts of a bus as it drives along.
explanation: A wheel, representing the wheels on the bus
A bus, symbolizing the main subject of the song
A clockwise arrow, illustrating the wheels on the bus going round and round
A crosswalk sign, symbolizing the bus stopping to pick up and drop off passengers
A family, representing the people on the bus and the various sounds they make
